title: Foreign Country
description: Six months before she is due to take up her position as the first female head of MI6, Amelia Levene vanishes without a trace. Former MI6 officer Thomas Kell is called out of retirement and ordered to find her. With only days before the story leaks to the press, Kell must begin to piece together Levene's final movements.Winner of 2012 CWA Ian Fleming Steel Dagger.Winner of the 2012 Scottish Crime Book of the Year award.
author: Charles Cumming
